name: bsv
description: A pure and powerful JavaScript Bitcoin SV (BSV) library.
author: Ryan X. Charles <ryan@moneybutton.com>

scripts.build-message: env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider webpack bundle ./message/index.js --config webpack.config.message.js  --output-library bsvMessage
scripts.build: yarn build-bsv-standalone ; yarn build-bsv && yarn build-ecies && yarn build-message && yarn build-mnemonic
scripts.oldbuild-ecies: env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider webpack bundle ./ecies/index.js --config webpack.subproject.config.js    --output-library bsvEcies -o ./bsv-ecies.min.js
scripts.oldbuild-message: env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider webpack bundle ./message/index.js --config webpack.subproject.config.js  --output-library bsvMessage -o ./bsv-message.min.js
scripts.oldbuild-mnemonic: env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider webpack bundle ./mnemonic/index.js --config webpack.subproject.config.js --output-library bsvMnemonic -o ./bsv-mnemonic.min.js
